meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Max Henkel Kerry Greene Michael Bilow Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7038.

div.div:
Michael Bilow game 4.
Kerry Greene game 1.

td.p: Max Henkel, a project manager from Madison, Wisconsin
Kerry Greene, a volunteer guardian ad litem from Manchester, New Hampshire
Michael Bilow, a Ph.D. student in computer science originally from Chicago, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $96,000)

tr.td: THE CIVIL WAR YEARS
WE'RE GONNA "MOON" YOU!
OCCUPATIONAL THERAPY
(Alex: Next, in honor of [*] Month, a whole category on that subject.)
NICKNAMES
BODY
SOUL

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'During his 1864 re-election bid, Lincoln said "It was not best to swap" these "while crossing the stream"')
